short_summary: Request for Standing Offers for temporaries in Quebec
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for temporary help services for the Quebec Region (excluding the National Capital Region). All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: WS3477564372 Doc4544766629

**Tender Title**: Temporary Help Services for the Quebec Region (excluding the National Capital Region)

**Publication Date**: April 24, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: May 14, 2024 2:00 PM ET

**Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

## Tender Details

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
*   **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle (Competitive - Open bidding)
*   **Trade Agreements**: 
    *   Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
    *   Accord de Partenariat transpacifique global et progressiste (PTPGP)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: 
    *   Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: 
    *   Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)

## Contracting Entity Information

*   **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**  
    11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage  
    Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

## Point of Contact

*   **Name**: Daniel Boisclair (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: [daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Note**: No Phone or Fax number provided.

## Notice and Documents

*   **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19446329?extsite=MTk0NDYzMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==  
    (Please ensure you have a valid Ariba account to access the notice.) 

This notice is also available on [Buy and Sell.gc.ca](http://buyandsell.gc.ca).
